thread.title: Trump: 'White House is Running So Smoothly'
thread.title_full: Trump: 'White House is Running So Smoothly'

author: AP
title: Trump: 'White House is Running So Smoothly'
text: Trump: 'White House is Running So Smoothly' After castigating the news media as purveyors of "fake news" and part of the corrupt system President Donald Trump told the audience "the White House is running so smoothly." He also said within weeks, a new plan will be submitted to repeal and replace the Affordable Care Act, known as Obamacare. (Feb. 18) Post to Facebook Trump: 'White House is Running So Smoothly' After castigating the news media as purveyors of "fake news" and part of the corrupt system President Donald Trump told the audience "the White House is running so smoothly." He also said within weeks, a new plan will be submitted to repeal and replace the Affordable Care Act, known as Obamacare.
